about.title: About Transport University
about.desc: The system for training highly qualified personnel for the republic's transport sector has been fundamentally improved based on advanced foreign experience and international standards, by widely introducing innovative teaching methods and modern pedagogical and information technologies into the educational process, as well as strengthening the material and technical base and increasing the scientific potential of sectoral educational institutions.

structure: STRUCTURE OF TASHKENT STATE TRANSPORT UNIVERSITY

appeal.title1: Rector of Tashkent State Transport University
appeal.desc: Do you have unresolved issues, problems, applications, complaints, or suggestions? If so, you can send your appeal directly to the Rector of Tashkent State Transport University.
appeal.email: Enter your email address to check the status of your appeal
appeal.top: You are being given the opportunity to send appeals directly to the Rector of Tashkent State Transport University electronically. We would also like to remind you that your appeal has official status.
appeal.li1: If you submit an appeal as an individual, you must provide your last name (first name, middle name), information about your place of residence, and the essence of your appeal. If you submit an appeal as a legal entity, you must provide the full name of the legal entity, its location (postal address), and the essence of the appeal.
appeal.li2: Pay special attention! It is prohibited to submit appeals containing slander, abusive language, or false information.
appeal.li3: We would also like to remind you that your appeals may be rejected in the following cases:
appeal.li4: appeals with inappropriate content (obscene or abusive language, threats, nonsensical proposals, and similar appeals);
appeal.li5: appeals containing unclear abbreviations or advertising materials, and appeals that do not contain specific applications, complaints, or proposals.
appeal.li6: Additionally, repeated appeals on the same issue that have already been answered, without new arguments or circumstances, will not be considered.
appeal.bottom: All these conditions are established based on the current legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

Brm.title: SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS
Brm.desc: The Sustainable Development Goals, known as the Global Goals as well, are a universal call to action to eradicate poverty, protect the planet, and bring peace and prosperity to all people. The goals were approved by all UN member states, including Uzbekistan, in September 2015. They include 17 goals and 169 targets to be achieved by 2030.

Aboutus.title: Main Information
Aboutus.desc: The Institute aims to enhance the system of preparing highly qualified specialists for the transport industry of the Republic of Uzbekistan based on international best practices and standards, introduce innovative forms and methods of education, modern pedagogical and information technologies, strengthen the material and technical base of transport education institutions, and further enhance their scientific potential: Ministry of Transport of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Ministry of Higher and Secondary Specialized Education, and the Uzbekistan Railways Joint Stock Company under the Decree No. PQ-4703 of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated May 4, 2020.
Aboutus.data1:
- It is the leading higher education institution for training, retraining, and enhancing the qualifications of highly educated specialists and scientific personnel for the transport sector;

- Gradually introduces the credit-module system of education in accordance with advanced international education standards and curricula starting from the 2020/2021 academic year;

- Subordinate to the Ministry of Transport of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
Aboutus.title2: Main tasks and activities of the University:
Aboutus.data2:
- Training, retraining, and enhancing the qualifications of competitive highly educated specialists and scientific-pedagogical personnel, as well as mass profession specialists, based on the needs of the transport sector and the labor market

- Conducting fundamental, practical, and innovative research and studies on urgent issues of transport sector development, and developing proposals for the widespread implementation of their results, including digital and other modern technologies

- Implementing joint educational programs and scientific projects, enhancing the qualifications of the University's professors and teachers, and organizing the education of graduates in master's and doctoral programs abroad in cooperation with leading foreign higher education and scientific institutions

- Creating a continuous system of personnel training for the transport sector, ensuring the continuity and coherence of the educational programs of academic lyceums and professional educational institutions in the sector

- Ensuring the practical connection of theoretical training in the educational process by organizing student internships in relevant sector organizations in cooperation with transport sector organizations, and establishing targeted cooperation to employ graduates
